name: FSX Animated Cockpits
description:
Description
Do you own Flight Sim World, FSX or Prepar3d ? Do you want to use your device as a second screen? With the collection of animated cockpits you can view the states of your gauges any time during your flight.

- Works on the go
- No local network required.
- You can track other users flight. You don't need FSX for this.
- Cockpits included:
- Cessna
- Creation
- DG808S
- Goose
- Havilan
- Maule

Use in combination with our free client FSXFollow, downloadable from www.positiongames.com.
